M

main(String[]) - Static method in class bootstrap.StartGameDriver
Step 0: Initialize the controllers Step 1: Create the Views Step 2: Inject controllers into Views through WindowManager Add Observers to players whenever users gives number of players input
main(String[]) - Static method in class model.GameManager
start of game manager to check with GameManger itself
Map - Class in model
represents the Map in the game in the form of ArrayList
Map() - Constructor for class model.Map
Constructor which initializes the data into Map.continents
MapDataBase - Class in model
This class holds the all data related to the Map Whenever a .map file is read it is stored in this class memebers
MapDataBase() - Constructor for class model.MapDataBase
 
MapEditorView - Class in view
 
MapEditorView(ReadController, WriteController) - Constructor for class view.MapEditorView
Constructor used to inject controller dependencies
MapValidity - Class in model
This class has methods to check the valid of a map loaded into the memory
MapValidity() - Constructor for class model.MapValidity
 
MapValidityTest - Class in model.mapio
 
MapValidityTest() - Constructor for class model.mapio.MapValidityTest
 
MapValidityTest1 - Class in model.mapio
 
MapValidityTest1() - Constructor for class model.mapio.MapValidityTest1
 
model - package model
 
model.contract - package model.contract
 
model.mapio - package model.mapio
